title: What element has 4 protons, 4 electrons, and 4 neutrons? - Quora

response.answer_text: it is laboratory produced isotope of beryllium Be, it survives for 0.00000000000000007 seconds only. The stable isotope has 4 protons, 4 electrons, and 5 neutrons.
Should you not take a Captain at your Periodic Table….? We got the isotope…….where . And why is this particle neutral?
